My website about big data, analysis and other bits and pieces.

About me

I am a mechanical engineer who turned into an analyst, who is now working towards becoming a data scientist. I have always been interested in statistics, math and solving complex problems, and over the last year I have started to dig deeper into the world of big data.
Most of my work will be posted on this website for anyone to read
If you want to know more about me, you can click here.
